welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huaiyin, China! Embrace the charm of this historical city known for its beautiful ancient architecture and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Huaiyin has to offer.

restaurants.name: McDonald's (麦当劳)
restaurants.description: McDonald's (麦当劳) is a fast food restaurant located in Huai'an.
restaurants.address: 淮海东路, Huai’an, 江苏

restaurants.name: Pizza Hut (必胜客)

restaurants.name: 芳芳私房菜
restaurants.description: 芳芳私房菜 is a huaiyang restaurant located in Huai'an.

restaurants.name: Lanzhou Lamien
restaurants.description: Lanzhou Lamien is a halal restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lianshui Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lianshui Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
